name: LioLib
description: Liolib is a fork of GeckoLib which is an animation engine for Minecraft Mods, with support for complex 3D keyframe-based animations, 30+ easings, concurrent animation support, sound and particle keyframes, event keyframes, and more.
authors: Gecko, Eliot, AzureDoom, Hydos, DerToaster, Tslat, KyoSleep
